code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{AppContext}from'./context/AppContext';import{v4 as uuidv4}from'uuid';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddExpenseForm=()=>{const{dispatch}=useContext(AppContext);const[name,setName]=useState('');const[cost,setCost]=useState('');const onSubmit=event=>{event.preventDefault();const expense={id:uuidv4(),name:name,cost:parseInt(cost)};dispatch({type:'ADD_EXPENSE',payload:expense});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:onSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"Name",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{required:"required",type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"Name",value:name,onChange:event=>setName(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-sm",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"cost",children:"Cost"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{required:"required",type:"text",className:"form-control",id:"cost",value:cost,onChange:event=>setCost(event.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Save"})})]})});};export default AddExpenseForm;
